document.full_text: drugs for rare cancers are allowed to hit the u.s. market based on low-quality clinical tests that raise concerns about both safety and efficacy, researchers said monday.
document.title: drugs for rare cancers approved after subpar tests
lines_and_colors: drugs for rare cancers are allowed to hit the u.s. market based on low-quality clinical tests that raise concerns about both safety and efficacy, researchers said monday.
